abstractionLevel._instruction: Add the abstraction level of this model version.

accessibility._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this dataset version.

authors._instruction: Add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this model version.

custodians._instruction: Add one or several custodians (person or organization) that are responsible for this model version.

description._instruction: Enter a description (abstract) for this model version (max. 200 words; no references).

developers._instruction: Add one or several developers (person or organization) that contributed to the code implementation of this model version.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this model version.

fullDocumentation._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of a full documentation of this model version.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (title) for this model version.

funding._instruction: Add all funding information of this model version.

inputDataset._instruction: Add the dataset version that was used as input for this model version.

hasAlternativeVersions._instruction: Add all model versions that can be used alternatively to this model version.

hasSupplementVersions._instruction: Add all model versions that supplement this model version.

homepage._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this model version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the model version preceding this model version.

license._instruction: Add the license of this model version.

modelFormat._instruction: Add the format of this model version.

otherContributions._instruction: Add the contributions for each involved person or organization going beyond being an author, custodian or developer of this model version.

relatedPublications._instruction: Add further publications besides the documentation (e.g. an original research article) providing the original context for the production of this model version.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) of the first broadcast/publication of this model version.

repository._instruction: Add the file repository of this model version.

scope._instruction: Add the scope of this model version.

shortName._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this model version (max. 30 characters, no space).

studyTarget._instruction: Add all study targets of this model version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this model version.

versionInnovations._instruction: Enter a short summary of the novelties/peculiarities of this model version.
